com.ikueb.wallclock

Interface AlarmFixedWallClock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FixedWallClock, WallClock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedAlarmClock

    public interface AlarmFixedWallClock
extends FixedWallClock
    Specifies a form of clock that can set alarms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener)
      Registers a listener for all updates.
      void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener, java.time.LocalDate dateToAlarm)
      Registers a listener for all updates happening on that date.
      void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener, java.time.LocalDateTime dateTimeToAlarm)
      Registers a listener for all updates happening on that date and time.
      void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener, java.time.LocalTime timeToAlarm)
      Registers a listener for all updates happening on that time.
      void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener for all updates.
      void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener, java.time.LocalDate dateToSnooze)
      Unregisters a listener for all updates at the date.
      void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener, java.time.LocalDateTime dateTimeToSnooze)
      Unregisters a listener for all updates at the date and time.
      void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener, java.time.LocalTime timeToSnooze)
      Unregisters a listener for all updates at the time.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ikueb.wallclock.FixedWallClock

        setDate, setDateTime, setTime

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ikueb.wallclock.WallClock

        date, dateTime, getZone, instant, offset, time, zonedDateTime

    • Method Detail

      • alarm

        void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener)
        Registers a listener for all updates.
        This will be overridden if a more specific date and/or time is given.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register for all updates

      • alarm

        void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener,
           java.time.LocalDate dateToAlarm)
        Registers a listener for all updates happening on that date.
        This overrides the 'all updates' specification.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        dateToAlarm - the date to alarm for all updates at the date

      • alarm

        void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener,
           java.time.LocalTime timeToAlarm)
        Registers a listener for all updates happening on that time.
        This overrides the 'all updates' specification.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        timeToAlarm - the time to alarm for all updates at the time

      • alarm

        void alarm(AlarmClockListener listener,
           java.time.LocalDateTime dateTimeToAlarm)
        Registers a listener for all updates happening on that date and time.
        This overrides the 'all updates' specification.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        dateTimeToAlarm - the date and time to alarm

      • snooze

        void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener for all updates.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to snooze for all updates

      • snooze

        void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener,
            java.time.LocalDate dateToSnooze)
        Unregisters a listener for all updates at the date.
        If this is the last alarm to be unregistered, the listener is effectively unregistered for all updates.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        dateToSnooze - the date to snooze for all updates at the date

      • snooze

        void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener,
            java.time.LocalTime timeToSnooze)
        Unregisters a listener for all updates at the time.
        If this is the last alarm to be unregistered, the listener is effectively unregistered for all updates.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        timeToSnooze - the time to snooze for all updates at the time

      • snooze

        void snooze(AlarmClockListener listener,
            java.time.LocalDateTime dateTimeToSnooze)
        Unregisters a listener for all updates at the date and time.
        If this is the last alarm to be unregistered, the listener is effectively unregistered for all updates.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        dateTimeToSnooze - the date and time to snooze
